post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
01 Communique is presently hiring Software Developers. If you are:
- Competent in Borland C++ using OWL and/or Microsoft C++ using MFC - Have development experience on Windows and Linux platform - Have experience in developing Internet-related software is an asset - Independent & highly motivated
Please submit your updated resume to:
Email: hr@01com.com (Ref: 0105 Software Developers) Fax: 905-795-0101
01 Communique is a TSX listed company and you can find more information on the company at www.01com.com.
HR Gigi Loo 01 Communique 905-795-2888
post.title: Software Dev
